extendedInfo.description: Document scanning using your phone's camera to convert one or more pages into a PDF. Like having a document scanner/photocopier/fax machine in your pocket!PDFs are compressed and enhanced, saved to SD card and can be emailed directly. v1.2.9 choice for default email recipient and subject - useful to send to fax gateway.

reviews.title: Need improvement
reviews.comment: Please unable camera flash to help if possible.  I use galaxy tab original gt-p1000.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Every time I want to send pdf attachment to email it closes,frustrating, I like this al but I want to send attachments via emails anf not looking phon

reviews.comment: Used to work ok, now its just a black screen before picture on the Nexus S. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work after android os upgrade. Have to buy again for working version. Bad business model!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working on galaxy S4
reviews.comment: It was working fine but now that I have the S4 the picture is not even showing. I payed for the full version. Please fix.
reviews.author: jorge cantres

reviews.comment: Purchased just before I upgraded to a Vibrant and it won\'t work unless I upgrade and pay for 2.0. Really? ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: v1.2.9: Decent app, but switched to Document Scanner for its DropBox integration, ultra-clear PDFs, ease of use. Droid X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: null error please try again
reviews.comment: hadn\'t worked in weeks, and why would u charge for the same app on the other one? what is the difference? please fix, this isn\'t with almost $7
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It was great on Google phone but is lousy on Inspire. It comes out hard to read... distorted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app! I use the scanner to email my daughter\'s reportcard, pix from a newspaper article, documents for a real estate sale.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No updates in a long a** time. Quality of scans are inferior. Expected more out of the author. Guess I was wrong. Looks like the author abandoned app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Scan2PDF mobile
reviews.comment: You guys are great. I changed my phone and all I had to do is download your app and I am back in biz. You didn\'t try and sell it to me again :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Most productive app I have, essential!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was working great until droid x 2.2 came out. 5 stars for fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great and Useful Application Worked like a charm sending in my scanned timesheets. However got uneven results in low light conditions. Perhaps adding the ability for adjustable flash (an inate camera feature) will help fix that? Easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super App! Works 100%
reviews.comment: Excellent! Works perfectly on my Galaxy S2 Epic Touch from sprint
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Enjoyed this quite a bit when i PREVIOUSLY bought on the Moment, but wont work on the Epic! Now i have to buy an upgade???
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app! I no longer take notes in meetings, I just take a photo of the white board @ the end and hey Presto :)

reviews.title: Not working anymore
reviews.comment: Used to be fine but now doesn\'t work on S4. Green lines fill the screen.
